 Function : Initializes a connection to JASPAR
 Usage   : 
 Returns : TFBS::DB::JASPAR4 object
 Args    : host, username, password
 Warnings: 
 Todo   :



Methods code




newdescriptiontopprevnext

sub new
 {
my $class=shift;
my $host=shift;
my $user=shift;
my $pass=shift;

my $db = TFBS::DB::JASPAR4->connect("dbi:mysql:jaspar:$host",
                                $user,
                                $pass);
                                
return $db;
}
